translation.brand-story-01:
Welcome to WARP, where sports and marketing coalesce into an explosive force.
Our vision was born from boundless
creativity and the belief that every athlete holds a captivating story waiting to be told.
translation.brand-story-02:
WARP Corporation found its beginning in the boundless realm of creativity,
where ideas take flight and dreams find their wings.
Just like the warp speed of a starship soaring through the galaxy,
our agency harnesses the velocity of innovation to propel athletes, brands,
and sports enthusiasts to unprecedented heights.
translation.brand-story-03:
We recognize that begind each athlete stands a compelling narrative,
waiting to be told - a story of relentless dedication,
indomitable spirit, and unyielding pursuit of excellence.
These stories, we knew, held the power to forge an unbreakable bond
between athletes and their adoring fans.
translation.brand-story-04:
Thus, we went beyond simply relying on existing Sports teams and
venues to create our own sports teams that are relevant
and closely connected to the lifestyle of today's sports fans.
translation.brand-story-05:
WARP's vision reaches beyond athletes alone;
it encompasses the very fabric of sports marketing. In a world where
commercial brands sought to align themselves with the energy and emotion of sports,
we recognize the opportunity to forge partnerships that transcend the conventional.
WARP envisions a seamless fusion between atheletes, brands, and fans
a trinity that would redefine the landscape of sports marketing.
translation.brand-story-06: Join us as we unveil the extraordinary.
translation.jackpot-fc-01: It is the world's first digital online Football club.
translation.jackpot-fc-02: The leading football influencers around the world joined to
translation.jackpot-fc-03: form Jackpot FC to showcase their talents
translation.jackpot-fc-04: to compete against rising football stars for a cash prize.
translation.jackpot-fc-05: With unrivaled football games in action,
translation.jackpot-fc-06: Jackpot FC, will mesmerize the MZ generation to the new height.
translation.jackpot-fc-07: Mr. Jackpot will lead the way for this
translation.jackpot-fc-08: online football club to send much needed messages across
